name: Testing Hangar
short_description: You are in a massive open room.
long_description:
You find yourself in a massive room with an 80 foot
ceiling. The room is so big that it could easily hold
several airplanes or helocopters. You see a small lever at
the end of a row of employee lockers.

You place the ssd into Freight-500's computer, and suddenly the fan kicks on.
Freight-500 comes to life and whizzes past you.

You see the robot drive across the testing hangar to the large forklift pallet loaded
with heavy boxes. When Freight-500 arrives at the pallet, an automated jack in the floor
lifts the pallet and Freight-500 drives under it.

Freight-500 heads for the other side of the hangar with the pallet.
You notice a door that was blocked by the cargo, that your sensors couldn't detect before.
You enter the giant testing hangar and Freight-500 seems to be wandering aimlessly.
You enter the testing hangar and see Freight-500 working like crazy to complete its tasks.

You enter the massive open room and see Freight-500 docked on a charger. The hum of his fan
makes it almost sound like he's snoring.
As you enter the testing hangar, Freight-500 zooms up to you.
